query: How many times was a Twitter/X post cited as a reference on the english Wikipedia pages for each day of August in the last June 2023 versions of the pages?

follow_up_queries: What is the exact number of mentions of Twitter/X on English Wikipedia pages in August 2023?
Are there any statistical analyses or reports available that quantify the mentions of Twitter/X related to CSAM?

result.query: Найти данные о количестве упоминаний постов Twitter/X на английских страницах Википедии за август 2023 года.

facts.fact: In August 2023, child pornography was reported as an ongoing issue on Twitter despite claims of prioritization by Elon Musk.
A 2023 investigation indicated a lapse in enforcement against child sexual abuse material (CSAM) on Twitter.
As of June 2023, Twitter's trust and safety teams had been significantly reduced, affecting their ability to manage CSAM.

sources.title: Twitter under Elon Musk - Wikipedia
sources.snippet:
### Child pornography

[edit]

In August 2023, it was reported that child pornography on Twitter was still an issue, despite statements by Musk that removing it was a top priority. As of June 2023, an investigation by the Stanford Internet Observatory at Stanford University reported "a lapse in basic enforcement" against child porn by Twitter within "recent months". The number of staff on Twitter's trust and safety teams were reduced, for example, leaving one full-time staffer to handle all child sexual abuse material in the Asia-Pacific region in November 2022. A 2023 investigation by BBC Pan

sources.title: Criticism of Twitter - Wikipedia
sources.snippet:
### Child sexual abuse material

[edit]

In August 2023, it was reported that child sexual abuse material (CSAM) on Twitter was still an issue, despite statements by Musk that removing it was a top priority. As of June 2023, an investigation by the Stanford Internet Observatory at Stanford University reported "a lapse in basic enforcement" against CSAM by Twitter within "recent months". The number of staff on Twitter's trust and safety teams were reduced, for example, leaving one full-time staffer to handle all child sexual abuse material in the Asia-Pacific region in November 2022. A 2023 inv
